title: MACP Research Papers Schema
description: Schema for the research_papers.json file in the MACP protocol.

id.description: Unique identifier for the paper (format: arxiv:XXXX.XXXXX).

title.description: The full title of the research paper.

authors.description: A list of the paper's authors.

url.description: A direct URL to the paper's abstract or PDF.

discovered_by.description: The ID of the agent or person who discovered the paper.

discovered_date.description: The date the paper was discovered (YYYY-MM-DD).

status.description: The current status of the paper in the research workflow.

insights.description: Key insights extracted from the paper (plain text strings).
